name: Devil's Bones
description:
Clink and clank your Devil's Bones through a dimly lit dungeon.

Using your dicey physique, roll your way towards the enemies and line your body  and numbers up correctly to land a swing!

Even attacks even! Odd attacks odd! Watch for traps and keep rolling to avoid incoming threats.

Made for the GMTK2022 Game Jam with a team of 6. ~50% of the assets used were made/designed by the team.
